authority intimidation.name: Authority Intimidation
authority intimidation.desc: Lightning moves slow your opponent more.

first interrogation.name: First Interrogation
first interrogation.desc: Attacks from opponents who are Electrified will give you Ether proportional to their initial damage.

second interrogation.name: Second Interrogation
second interrogation.desc: Opponents who are electrified do 50% less damage to you and do 50% less posture damage to you.

resolve crusher.name: Resolve Crusher
resolve crusher.desc: Lightning moves now apply stacks of 'Resolve Crusher'. At 4 stacks, you apply 'Electrified' to your opponent. Attacks from Electrified opponents are converted into Lightning damage, but will deal 10% less damage to you.
